page.title: 17Health E.K.Health Centre
page.content: We all think the health centre is a place of great use.It opens at 9am and closes either at 5.30pm or 6.00pm. 30 people work in the centre and they all say they enjoy it.Inside it is split up into different parts.One part is for the chiropodist and one section for the dentist.The four doctors share one big section.The waiting rooms are spotless and on the posters you can read all about the diseases you can catch.At the baby clinic they use a Manchester Rattle to test the babies' hearing.The sphygmomanometer tests the babies heart rate.There is a room called the slimmers room for overweight people and there is also a speech therapy room for children.Our class visited the centre and we learned all about it.It was very interesting and enjoyable.
